## Asking AI (not recommended)

![](gpt.png){fig-align="center"}

## Beware of stochastic parrots[^1] {.smaller}

-   LLMs don't *understand*, but are good at mimicry
-   Use with care:
    -   [May be wrong](https://www.theregister.com/2023/08/07/chatgpt_stack_overflow_ai/)
    -   May be inconsistent

. . .

-   Tools like ChatGPT pose possible ethical issues
    -   [Plagiarism](https://www.wired.com/story/chatgpt-college-university-plagiarism/)
    -   [Labor conditions](https://mashable.com/article/chat-gpt-open-ai-workers-exploitation)
    -   Inputs may be sent to parent companies
